title: Detectives Search for Robbery Suspects Targeting Cell Phone Stores
body:
Robbery Unit detectives are actively working to identify and arrest the suspects who have robbed two cell phone stores in the county this month. These same suspects are linked to multiple robberies in the District of Columbia.The above surveillance photos were taken on Tuesday, December 12, at a store in the 6200 block of Central Avenue in Seat Pleasant. The suspects also targeted another cell phone store in the 5400 block of Silver Hill Road in District Heights on December 3.In both of these cases, two suspects robbed the stores while a third suspect waited outside in a getaway vehicle.Anyone with information on this case is asked to call the Robbery Unit at 301-772-4905. Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477), or go online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com, or use the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google Play to download the app onto your mobile device.)
